source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video captures a first-person perspective of a kayaker navigating through a narrow, dark rock canyon filled with turbulent, white whitewater. The dark, textured rock walls of the canyon rise steeply on either side of the rushing water. Another kayaker in a red kayak is briefly visible further down the waterway. The scene is dynamic, with water splashing and the kayaker actively maneuvering through the rapids.
